rows.label: tlk400703_msg0002
rows.name: First, listen to what Yuu has to say.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0003
rows.name:
It's going to be a long
talk, so be prepared.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0004
rows.name:
Did you listen to Yuu's
complicated explanation?

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0005
rows.name:
First, you need to
accept a Merc Mission.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0006
rows.name:
It looks like you accepted the
mission that Yuu prepared.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0007
rows.name:
It's frustrating, but now you
just have to wait. Trust in the
Blades you've dispatched.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh... Looks like the
dispatched unit has returned.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0010
rows.name:
You get your reward then,
and that's when the mission
is finally complete.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0011
rows.name:
How was your first mission? It
must have been easy for you, Rex.

rows.label: tlk400703_msg0012
rows.name:
Go report back to Yuu
quickly. He was worried
about whether you could do it.
